https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lCnfsu7qbkGvuv7MUhkzwXGsfLh.jpg An OVA bundled with a PSP game Da Capo: D.C. I & II P.S.P. It features animated confession scenes for the four main heroines of the two games, Nemu, Kotori, Yume, and Otome. D.C. I&II P.S.P. Re-Animated
